content.text: 1 green bell pepper, cut into 1 inch pieces
content.eamr: ( ing-2 "1 green bell pepper, cut into 1 inch pieces" )
( ing-3 "1 cucumber - peeled, seeded and chopped" )

content.text: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil.
content.eamr: ( ing-6 "Bring a large pot of salted water to boil." )

content.text: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil.
content.eamr: ( ing-7 "Bring a large pot of salted water to boil." )

content.text: 0) Bring a large pot of salted water to boil.
1) Place the broccoli and cauliflower florets into the boiling water for one minute.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Place"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "the broccoli"@9:21 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "cauliflower florets"@26:45 / FOOD )
		:gol ( "the boiling water"@51:68 / FOOD )
		:duration ( dur-1-0 "one minute"@73:83 / DUR )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Combine broccoli, cauliflower, bell pepper, cucumber, carrot and Italian salad dressing in a medium size mixing bowl.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Combine"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( "broccoli"@11:19 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "cauliflower"@21:32 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "bell pepper"@34:45 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "cucumber"@47:55 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "carrot"@57:63 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "Italian salad dressing"@68:90 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-3-0 "a medium size mixing bowl"@94:119 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Cover the bowl and refrigerate the vegetables for one hour.
